definitions.definition: A pictorial representation of someone in which distinguishing features are exaggerated for comic effect .
In facial recognition systems, a face that has been modified to look less like the average face, and thus more distinctive .

main_definition: A pictorial representation of someone in which distinguishing features are exaggerated for comic effect .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) In facial recognition systems, a face that has been modified to look less like the average face, and thus more distinctive .
